title: League Having a fit or something?
body: just joined a game and everything was all good and then out of no where the timer reset when it was suppose to go to 10 seconds (once everyone locks in) and league in general is just having a fit for me, disconnecting me form chat when my internet is fine and i couldn't login in just before... riot fix this please

replies.body: hey...my timer jumped from 50 seconds to 10 seconds and then I got kicked out of queue bc it didn't let me pick a champ
yeah ;eagle os screwing up a lot, might wanna check these small little glitches out right
